title: sqlstate[23000]: integrity constraint violation: 1062 duplicate entry
body:
info: 
did an update to stabe5 today and i started to see lots of:
error while running hook (\oc\files\cache\updater::renamehook): sqlstate[23000]: integrity constraint violation: 1062 duplicate entry '718-98a1b40e4d02c64b650fdf9b6f5ed87d' for key 'fs_storage_path_hash' while the clients were connecting with webdav.

fs_storage_path_hash' was obviously different for many of the entries in the log.
is this exact case i've found the entry in the table oc_filecache:

*************************** 1. row ***************************
  storage: 718
     path: files/test/test4/test-blx.bib
path_hash: 98a1b40e4d02c64b650fdf9b6f5ed87d
*************************** 2. row ***************************


this file seems to have been uploaded fine and this is obviously the case with other files which trigger this error in the log.

this is very critical and i hope the devs will give it high priority!

thank you!

@schiesbn @icewind1991 @mtgap
